RelatedSentence: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov called UN , OSCE to ensure impartial probe into Odessa deaths .

MOSCOW - Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov has called on the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe and the United Nations to ensure an open and impartial probe by Kyiv into deaths that occurred in the Ukrainian city of Odessa this month , the Foreign Ministry said on May 19 .
